## Device Information

| Field | Value |
|---|---|
| Device name | e.g. Redmi Note 12 Pro |
| Codename | e.g. ruby (Settings > About Phone > All Specs) |
| Chipset | e.g. Snapdragon 778G |
| Android version | |
| MIUI/HyperOS version | |
| Region variant | e.g. Global, China, India |

| Command | Result | Notes |
